title: Porterville police chief to speak at PARA
content:
Porterville Police Chief Eric Kroutil will speak to the Porterville Area Republican Assembly at 6 p.m. on Thursday. 
  
Kroutil was appointed chief in February. He has held almost every position within the department during his 22-year career, including assignments in patrol, investigations, services and administration.
